name: .ICON File Extension
summary: Learn about .ICON files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An ICON file contains image data for a computer icon used to represent files, folders, applications, and so on. ICON files are typically saved as small, square bitmap images, ranging from 16 x 16 to 256 x 256 pixels in size.

content: Most Windows Icon files use the .ICO extension. Macintosh Icon files use the .ICNS extension.

instructions: You an open an ICON file in GIMP (cross-platform), or you can open the file in Adobe Photoshop (Windows, Mac) with the Iconfactory IconBuilder plug-in installed.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
